page.title: 08A day in the life of a mum
page.content: 1.00pm and lunch-time Mark is having {Campbells}Chiken soup followed by a yoghurt.I will have a salad.After lunch more tidying up and dishes.Mark then goes to bed for his nap and I do any ironing.The sun is shining and showing all the dirty marks on the window so I decide to clean them.I get the{Windowleen}and off I go.After all the windows are done I take a cup of coffee{Maxwell-house}is my favourite. Mark is ready for another snack a glass of milk and a bannana sandwich and a{Kitkat}biscuit.Next I put away the ironing and tidy the hot-press.Now I will sit out in the sun for half an hour before the children arrive home from school then my work really starts.
